title: TextureCooccurrenceFeatures
description: Calculates texture co-occurrence features such as Energy, Entropy, Inverse Difference Moment, Inertia, Cluster Shade, and Cluster Prominence from an input image.

image_dimension.title: Image Dimension
image_dimension.description: The dimensionality of the input image, e.g., 2 for 2D images, 3 for 3D images.

input_image.title: Input Image
input_image.description: The input image file for which texture co-occurrence features will be calculated.

number_of_bins_per_axis.title: Number of Bins Per Axis
number_of_bins_per_axis.description: The number of bins per axis to be used in the histogram for texture calculation. Defaults to 256.

mask_image.title: Mask Image
mask_image.description: Optional mask image to specify the regions of interest in the input image for which features will be calculated.

mask_label.title: Mask Label
mask_label.description: Label value in the mask image to specify which region to process. Defaults to 1.
